name: Need More Space (wheatleyhere)
description:
Our cute astronaut stuck in a loop. They should control their thirst and hunger without eaten by monsters or die because of extreme temperature changes. They cannot survive without your help! Help our Astronaut to find the crystals to refuel his ship. Warning! Be aware of the monsters!

Need More Space Instructions:

WASD: Movement

E: Collect Item

Space: Use the Item (Drink or Eat)

Shift: Speed Run

You can collect one item at a time and you should take the crystal to the ship and refuel it.
